description: The Tip Calculator is a simple calculator that will help you figure out a tip in a couple of taps of your screen. If you are visiting a restaurant, getting a haircut, or on a taxi ride, all you have to do is start up this application, enter the initial charge, select your percentage (10% - 25%), and hit "Calcuate" button, and presto, your tip amount and the grand total will show for you. This application is precise and simple.
